column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: Police forces cracked down and surrounded two apartment complexes
column4: detaining many Chinese on 29 August 2019 at an apartment building # 194
column7: Boeung Keng Kang.------According to law enforcement sources
column8: the operation consisted of a mixed force of the National Police
column9: with the participation of the Anti-Crime Department
column10: in collaboration with the immigration and local police. Initially
column11: authorities detained 10 Chinese men and confiscated several computers in Boeung Keng Kang Dam
column13: Boeng Keng Kang district.------The suspects are reportedly wanted by Chinese police.------The exact reason has not been given
column14: but the source says it was in connection with an online extortion case. ------TDNEWS
